data.text: @bear_bouncey @MaricruzMaclean @nzherald You are guilty by association. How is supporting these thugs tenable? https://t.co/Yag10OSGnk
@cliff_leaf_kl @AndReSGrooVe @nzherald So what do they do if the bank or landlords are making demands, people are being backed into a corner & it’s not ok & the government isn’t listing.
@mandy82086351 @AndReSGrooVe @nzherald OK they want their jobs back, but don't take children to such a protest. This person is just saying the children should go back to school.
@nzherald Pigs beat them bullied them and left them with nothing.  The law is jah in cinders law... She is now a despot and will vanish like sooo many.
@Science_Is_Fact @drummingnz @MaricruzMaclean @nzherald You really need something in you life. Something more fulfilling than attacking people 🙏🤍

@Science_Is_Fact @MaricruzMaclean @nzherald Our people are standing united against this because even though everything of there's were destroyed, they were pushed and attacked, they all became stronger as a result. Everyone in that crowd (who wasn't set up) are likely traumatised, but now they see the true colors of power

@Science_Is_Fact @MaricruzMaclean @nzherald You're likely wrong about her. She seems like she's got a good head, understanding of situations and people, which means she shows more care and character than you have been doing 🤷‍♀️ sorry.

@Science_Is_Fact @MaricruzMaclean @nzherald Just watch as all the documents from Pfizer come out and contradicts everything you and the government have been defending. The jab is only 12% effective for 5-11yr olds. Whoops. Was it necessary to force it on kids who want to play sports? No. What else will come out?

@bear_bouncey @Science_Is_Fact @nzherald I am not using any examples, and I am not British.  I voted for Jacinda and for the most part I like her, but I think she is wrong on this one. If they want people to trust the government, they need to be open and clear with the information. that is the best way to prevail.
